Ninjutsu {1}{R}{W}
[i]Sabotage[/i] – When Kagero, Sparks Fly enters, tap up to one target artifact and put a stun counter on it. it loses all abilities until your next turn.
[i][i]Celebration[/i][/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, if two or more nonland permanents you control entered this turn, tap target artifact you don't control, it loses all abilities until your next turn.
Partner with Saizo, Bursting Flame
